meanings.definition: The ability of an antigen to react with an antibody.
meanings.sent1: The immunoreactivity of the vaccine helped the body fight off the virus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study immunoreactivity to understand how the immune system responds to threats.
meanings.sent3: The immunoreactivity of the cells was so high, they seemed like tiny warriors fighting off invaders.
meanings.sent4: Her immunoreactivity was like a lock and key, perfectly fitting the antigen to neutralize it.
meanings.sent5: The immunoreactivity of the antibodies was like a shield protecting the body from harm.

meanings.definition: The state of being reactive to an immune response.
meanings.sent1: After the infection, his immunoreactivity increased, showing his body was fighting back.
meanings.sent2: The patient's immunoreactivity indicated a strong defense against the illness.
meanings.sent3: The immunoreactivity of the immune system was like a superhero power, always ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: Her immunoreactivity was a beacon, guiding the immune cells to where they were needed most.
meanings.sent5: The immunoreactivity of the body was like an alarm system, alerting to any intruders.
